<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeColorConstant"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeColorConstant

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeConstant](class_visualshadernodeconstant.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A [Color](class_color.md) constant to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Has two output ports representing RGB and alpha channels of [Color](class_color.md).

Translated to ``vec3 rgb`` and ``float alpha`` in the shader language.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
